description: Micro has delivered quality for years and this car is no exception. This new Micro Baic D20 BAIC 2018 D20 is available for sale and has a automatic transmission system as well as other great features. Priced at Rs.3550000, this car is fantastic value for money. Don’t forget to mention Carmudi when you contact the seller!..
name: Micro Baic D20  2018
